name: LuckShot
description:
4-Player Local Multiplayer

Be the first to 6 points

"Cannon Phase"

Use "Tab" to check points and money

Fire Dice onto the field and roll the highest on the field to obtain the displayed money amounts. Ties and 0-rolls reward only $1.

Fire dice onto the center platform to earn victory points. First to 6 wins.

Use the control panel on the right to change the dice's velocity and torque.

"C" will turn on and off Cinematic mode.

"Q" and "E" will give different perspectives

"Shop Phase"

Use "Tab" to check points and money

Drag Dice onto the edit podium to edit the faces.

Use the dicemap in the top right to rotate the dice.

Click on blank spaces on the dice to flip them to dots. Each additional dot on a single face costs more and more. Additional costs are displayed below. Use the Button on the right to confirm the Total cost displayed.

Right Click to exit editing the dice.

In the lobby, press the "New Dice" button to obtain a new dice. A new dice costs $6. Confirm on the right to get your new dice.

When you are finished editing your dice, press "Next Player" to pass to the next player.

When the last player has passed, then the next cannon round begins. Field values will accumulate over time if not taken.
